description: This file contains core game logic for TicTacToe, including board management, move validation, winner detection, and an AI opponent implementation using minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning. It defines classes for game state and AI decision-making, with methods for move execution, game state evaluation, and AI move selection.

classes.name: TicTacToeGame
classes.description: Main class managing the TicTacToe game state, move validation, and winner detection.

classes.name: MinimaxAI
classes.description: AI player class implementing minimax algorithm with adjustable difficulty levels.

methods.name: TicTacToeGame.__init__
methods.description: Initializes the game board with an optional state string.

methods.name: TicTacToeGame.make_move
methods.description: Attempts to make a move at a specified position for a given player.

methods.name: TicTacToeGame.is_valid_move
methods.description: Checks if a move is valid based on current board state.

methods.name: TicTacToeGame.check_winner
methods.description: Determines if the game has a winner or is a draw.

methods.name: TicTacToeGame.get_valid_moves
methods.description: Returns a list of valid move positions.

methods.name: TicTacToeGame.get_board_state
methods.description: Returns the current board state as a string.

methods.name: MinimaxAI.__init__
methods.description: Initializes AI with specified difficulty level and configures parameters.

methods.name: MinimaxAI.get_ai_move
methods.description: Determines the AI's next move based on current game state and difficulty.

methods.name: MinimaxAI._minimax
methods.description: Recursive minimax algorithm with alpha-beta pruning to evaluate game states.

methods.name: MinimaxAI._evaluate_position
methods.description: Heuristic evaluation of board position when maximum search depth is reached.
